name: Roll A Blade
description:
Dice-Rolling Deckbuilder. Roll dice to defeat enemies.

ABILITY INDEX

- Attack (red): Damages enemy

- Block (blue): Defend against enemy attacks

- Heal (pink): Replenish HP

- Gold (gold): Gain gold

- Injure (purple): Target takes X extra damage when attacked

- Poison (green): Applies X damage to target at the end of turn.

- Weaken (grey): Reduces target's attack by 50%
